Want to try the latest version, goto [http://demo.bigbluebutton.org/ http://demo.bigbluebutton.org/] and if you find a bug, pleaes check the [http://code.google.com/p/bigbluebutton/issues/list issue tracker] to see if it's already been reported.  If not, please create a new issue and provide
  * a short description   
  * the steps to reproduce it.
